name: High Resolution Population Density Estimates
description: The world's most accurate population datasets, derived from satellite imagery and census data.
SDGevidence: This webpage contains information about how the dataset is designed and used [https://dataforgood.fb.com/tools/population-density-maps/], including case studies where the data has been used by orgs like UNDP to inform the COVID-19 response, or where it underpins research published in Nature about accurately estimating flood exposure. There is also a research paper available comparing other population estimates to this dataset [https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.06.18.160101v1.full.pdf].
